content: squirmles scarf by kym materials ● super chunky eyelash yarn ~320g sirdar touch in ducky ● black dk yarn scraps for eyes ● white dk yarn scraps for eyes tools 10mm crochet hook 3 5mm crochet hook darning needle gauge unimportant terminology and stitches uk crochet terms chainless foundation tutorial here https //yarnandchai com/tutorial-chainless-foundation-no-more-chains/ uses us terms csdc - chainless starting double_crochet can be replaced with a chain 2 if you prefer double_crochet - double_crochet decrease - decrease increase - increase sts - stitches pattern snoot using super chunky yarn and 10mm hook chainless foundation double_crochet to make starting row of 2sts csdc double_crochet 1 each row until snoot is desired length approx 12cm/14 row don t fasten_off head row 1 csdc double_crochet into same st increase double_crochet to end of row turn 3sts row 2 csdc double_crochet into same st increase double_crochet to end of row turn 4sts row 3-14 repeat row 2 to a total of 16sts don t fasten_off body work row in double_crochet with csdc to start until scarf is desired length excluding the tail tail approx 38cm/40 row don t fasten_off *note my main body is ~155cm however this ended up needing just over 3 balls of the sirdar touch to complete if you want to try and get away with only 3 balls you may wish to make it a little shorter tail row 1 csdc double_crochet 6 double_crochet decrease double_crochet 7 turn 15 sts row 2 csdc double_crochet across turn row 3 csdc double_crochet across turn row 4 csdc double_crochet 5 double_crochet decrease double_crochet 7 turn 14 sts row 5 6 csdc double_crochet across turn row 7 csdc double_crochet 5 double_crochet decrease double_crochet 6 turn 13 sts row 8 9 csdc double_crochet across turn row 10 csdc double_crochet 4 double_crochet decrease double_crochet 6 turn 12 sts row 11 12 csdc double_crochet across turn row 13 csdc double_crochet 4 double_crochet decrease double_crochet 5 turn 11 sts row 14 15 csdc double_crochet across turn row 16 csdc double_crochet 3 double_crochet decrease double_crochet 5 turn 10 sts row 17 18 csdc double_crochet across turn row 19 csdc double_crochet 3 double_crochet decrease double_crochet 4 turn 9 sts row 20 21 csdc double_crochet across turn row 22 csdc double_crochet 2 double_crochet decrease double_crochet 4 turn 8 sts row 23 24 csdc double_crochet across turn row 25 csdc double_crochet 2 double_crochet decrease double_crochet 3 turn 7 sts row 26 27 csdc double_crochet across turn row 28 csdc double_crochet 1 double_crochet decrease double_crochet 3 turn 6 sts row 29 30 csdc double_crochet across turn row 31 csdc double_crochet 1 double_crochet decrease double_crochet 2 turn 5 sts row 32 33 csdc double_crochet across turn row 34 csdc double_crochet decrease double_crochet 2 turn 4 sts row 35 36 csdc double_crochet across turn row 37 csdc double_crochet decrease double_crochet 1 turn 3 sts row 38 39 csdc double_crochet across turn row 40 csdc double_crochet decrease 2 sts fasten_off with long enough tail to weave in later eye sclera make 2 using white dk
